import React from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import { propTypes } from 'react-bootstrap/esm/Image' import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom' export default function Navbar(props) { return (
{props.title}
  • Home
  • {props.aboutText}
) } Navbar.propTypes ={ title:PropTypes.string, aboutText: PropTypes.string }
